title: What should a 12-year-old watch on YouTube? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hello This question just appeared in my feed. So I would answer this. A 12 year old child can watch a lot of interesting content on YouTube. They can pick one topic everyday and research it from there. Then note down whatever they find. This extensively improved their general knowledge. Let them do research on various different topics. Animated content is often easier to understand, so they can search for such videos on YouTube for clearing doubts and getting a deeper view. They can also entertain themselves, there are many interesting videos one days. However, keep my suggestion, do not watch those type of people who fall into the 'YouTuber' category. Entertainment is good. I am not talking about all entertainment but some people who just talk about random things on YouTube, or 'roast' and all that. YouTube was never meant for this. YouTube was supposed to be an intellectual hub like quora but it too got spoilt after all these came. Also gaming and all. What is the point of watching a game :) I do not want to target anyone personally, but I found some channels like those on YouTube which I don't think are worth wasting your time. For example, carry minati, BB vines, Ashish, PewDiePie, etc. There are much more things for YouTube entertainment. They can watch those. Thanks

YouTube has ocean of content in their database and it's really necessary that we should filter out the content that are important for us .
